title: AT&T 20 Ping spike?
body: So, I live near chicago, in michigan and I used to get 30 ping. Now I get a consistent 55 ping, is this a problem with my carrier at&t? My friend who lives down the street from me, who has comcast, gets 20 ping

replies.body:
I have the same exact problem as this poster.  Also on AT&T

Edit: When I ping the Riot League server in Chicago at " 104.160.131.1 " I get like 40 ping, but in game, I get 55-60.
I have the same problem, I live in Michigan and was getting 33, now i get 50~

Hey CozyBuckets, 

There are two ways you can try and figure this out to help with you ping issue. First, you may want to try Riot's connection KB and see if that helps at all and if that doesn't seem to fix this issue, go with your idea about contacting your ISP. 

Riot Connection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Good luck! 

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
No. It is not his computer's fault. This is an AT&T issue clear-cut.
What do you mean by try Riot's connection KB?
I am also in literally the same position as you. I used to have 30 ping now its 45+. I have AT&T and live near Chicago.
